docsTags.text:
- Your content or if nothing, your routing point webc-app-router.
Using this slot you can wrap all pages with a custom component;
docsTags.name: slot

docsTags.text:
before - Content that goes behind this component in the DOM.
A "header" can be easily implemented using this slot;
docsTags.name: slot

docsTags.text:
after - Place for final content.
A "footer" can be easily implemented using this slot;
docsTags.name: slot
